creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: heavy tan stripe fabric; light stripe in slightly darker fabric; large bias cut gusset panel in crotch; embroidery (cross stitch) on outside leg at bottom; black outline with multicolored rows of crosses separated by lines; colors used:  gold, red, blue, black, purple and green; elastic in waist; gathered at leg openings
title: Pair of woman's pants
